title: Theodore Roosevelt National Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       The park is open 24 hours a day, year-round. Please note that the North Unit operates on Central time, while the South Unit operates on Mountain time.  Visitor Centers: South Unit Visitor Center Open daily 8:00 am to 5:00 pm MT Painted Canyon Visitor Center  Open daily 8:30 am to 5:00 pm MT  North Unit Contact Station Open daily 9:00 am to 5:00 pm CT The main visitor center has been closed due to a structural failure. A temporary visitor contact station is in use while planning and construction are underway for a new permanent facility. Campgrounds: Cottonwood Campground  Open all year. Limited services from mid-October to mid-May. Fees collected year-round. Juniper Campground  Open all year. Limited services from mid-October to mid-May. Fees collected year-round. Portions of the South Unit Scenic Loop Drive and North Unit Scenic Road may be closed in winter due to snow and ice. Check the status of the park roads.
